bio: A web3 enthusiast, still digging through the Blockchain for the bits and pieces. I'm an entrepreneur and a responsible of the world.
contributionDescription:
I first learned about the Blockchain in 2021, and by then, some of the projects had already been conceived. As I get to know what a smart contract is, Optimism airdrops had reached many wallets as incentives. 
But now, I have made a couple test on the Ethereum Networks layer 1 and 2. This account is even recently created after the one I had was compromised by phishing attacks. Hence, I'm still new, and I hope there's retroactive reward I missed somewhere.
Real utility
Thanks for this opportunity
impactDescription:
I first learned about the Blockchain in 2021, and by then, some of the projects had already been conceived. As I get to know what a smart contract is, Optimism airdrops had reached many wallets as incentives. 
But now, I have made a couple test on the Ethereum Networks layer 1 and 2. This account is even recently created after the one I had was compromised by phishing attacks. Hence, I'm still new, and I hope there's retroactive reward I missed somewhere.
Thanks for this opportunity
